programme.title: NHL Hockey Florida Panthers at Carolina Hurricanes
programme.desc: The defending champion Panthers visit the Hurricanes for Game 1 of the Eastern Conference finals. Florida advanced to its third straight Stanley Cup semifinal with a 6-1 victory over Toronto in Game 7. Carolina ousted Washington in five games.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Florida Panthers at Carolina Hurricanes
programme.desc: The Hurricanes try to level their series with the Panthers in Game 2 of the Eastern Conference finals. Florida converted two of its three power-play opportunities in Game 1 and Sergei Bobrovsky stopped 31 shots to secure a 5-2 victory over Carolina.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Carolina Hurricanes at Florida Panthers
programme.desc: The Panthers return home with a 2-0 series lead for Game 3 of the East final against the Hurricanes. Florida seized control with a 5-0 victory in Game 2. Conn Smythe Trophy contender Sergei Bobrovsky (FLA) recorded his third shutout this postseason.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Carolina Hurricanes at Florida Panthers
programme.desc: The Panthers try to blow away the Hurricanes in Game 4 of the East final. Defending Stanley Cup champion Florida broke a 1-1 tie with five goals in a 9:08 span of the third period en route to a 6-2 triumph in Game 3, and a commanding 3-0 series lead.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Florida Panthers at Carolina Hurricanes
programme.desc: The Hurricanes head back home to host the Panthers for Game 5 of the Eastern Conference finals. Frederik Andersen made 20 stops for his second shutout of the postseason as Carolina staved off elimination with a 3-0 victory over Florida in Game 4.

programme.desc: Episode one of NHL Trophy Case dives into the Hart Trophy, the Vezina Trophy and the Lady Byng, and features bites from marquee NHL players Tom Wilson, Leon Draisaitl, Connor McDavid, Robert Thomas, David Pastrnak and Morgan Rielly.

programme.title: NHL Trophy Case

programme.title: NHL Hockey Edmonton Oilers at Dallas Stars
programme.desc: For the second straight season, the Stars and Oilers duel in the West finals, starting with Game 1. Edmonton vanquished Dallas in six games in 2024 for their first Stanley Cup Final berth since 2006. Dallas has made four of the last five West finals.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Edmonton Oilers at Dallas Stars
programme.desc: The Oilers try to make sense of their West final against the Stars, down 1-0 entering Game 2. Edmonton led 3-1 after two periods in Game 1 before Dallas scored five unanswered goals in the third for a 6-3 victory. Tyler Seguin (DAL) scored twice.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Dallas Stars at Edmonton Oilers
programme.desc: The deadlocked Western Conference final shift to Canada for Game 3 between the Stars and Oilers. Edmonton tied the series at 1-1 with a 3-0 victory over Dallas in Game 2. Stuart Skinner stopped all 25 Stars shots after allowing five goals in Game 1.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Dallas Stars at Edmonton Oilers
programme.desc: The Stars try to get even with the Oilers in Game 4 of the Western Conference finals. Edmonton leads the series 2-1 after an emphatic 6-1 victory in Game 3. Connor McDavid scored twice in that contest, giving him a postseason-most 22 points.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Edmonton Oilers at Dallas Stars
programme.desc: The Oilers look to book a return trip to the Stanley Cup Final in Game 5 against the Stars. Edmonton set up the potential clinching contest with a 4-1 victory at home over Dallas in Game 4. Corey Perry (EDM) notched a goal and an assist in the win.
